# Figures

```{r, results="asis"}

for (i in 1:length(params$figurelist)) {
  
  writeLines("\n")
  
  writeLines(paste0("## ", names(params$figurelist)[i]))
  
  print(params$figurelist[[i]])
  
  writeLines("\n")
}
```
